attributes.action: Clarify the crime of purgery so that the Met Police and DPP may consider charging Paul Burrell with Purgery.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Paul Burrell has been called a liar in open court.  We the undersigned value English Law and petition the PM clarify the law of purgery so that the Director of Public Prosection may consider charging Paul Burrell with Purgery for lying in court.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
